thread.title: 21st Century Fox Revenue Falls Without Super Bowl Boost

author: Austen Hufford
title: 21st Century Fox Revenue Falls Without Super Bowl Boost

organizations.name: fox revenue falls without super bowl boost 21st century fox inc.

text:
21st Century Fox Inc. posted lower revenue as higher distributor fees failed to offset a fall in advertising revenue compared with a Super Bowl-boosted quarter a year ago.
Despite a strong quarter for the companyâ€™s cable network segment, its television and filmed entertainment segments weighed down results.
21st Century Fox in December agreed...
